name: Tom Curly's The Shipper
description:
Tom Curly's The Shipper is a turn based RPG in which your party attacks automatically, but their attack changes based on their relationship, which you can change!
Shooting two party members will make them fall in love, but the third one will become jealous of them!

This is a very basic proof of concepte without Audio, proper Level Design and many art assets! Please let me know what you think!

I developed this Prototype during the GMTK Game Jam 2021, the theme was "Joined Together", and I designed the game's main mechanic (shooting two party members to make them fall in love) based on it.
